name: REPLICATOR (purmalis)
description:
A group of galactic mercenaries have arrived at the «SPUTNIK» space station to uncover the secrets of the «REPLICATOR» project. Features:
  • Dynamic battles. You will have to constantly move and aim well to survive!
  • Danger at every turn. Many different enemies and traps will not let you get bored.
  • Generated weapon. Each weapon in the game has a number of procedurally generated characteristics.
  • Various improvements. Explore stations looking for new upgrades for your character. Create your own build!
  • Four playable characters. They differ in starting stats, preferred weapons and special abilities.
Looking for feedback

I released this demo to get feedback from real players. Please leave your comments or email me: robert@purmalis.ru

Game in development

The game is in active development. This demo contains only a small portion of the planned content. In addition, during the game, you can find errors and bugs.

What to expect from the full version
  • More weapons and items.
  • New enemies and bosses.
  • Loops. After another victory over the last boss, more dangers and enemies appear on the levels.
  • Secret levels.
  • Maybe something else :)
Making a video or writing a blog?
